name: Age Resistance, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as lesser age resistance, except you ignore all Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained from middle age, old age, and venerable age.
text_zh: 这个法术类似次级岁月抵抗 (Age Resistance, Lesser)，不过它可以抵消掉中年、老年和暮年的力量、敏捷和体质罚值。
